name: Same Procedure as last Jam (GGJ16 Entry)
name_original: Same Procedure as last Jam (GGJ16 Entry)
description:
Our local jamsite’s last theme was “strange rituals”. The GGJ16’s theme is “ritual”.

Our protagonist is a gamedev, who is too late for the next gamejam and cannot wait to hear the next jam’s theme.

Source Code
  • Download: https://github.com/BrutalHack/ggj16
  • License: GPL v3
Technology used

Unity, Photoshop, Jetbrains Rider, Git

Help / Controls

Move with accelerometer or mouse.

Swipe the dreams from the last game jam away.

Game Jam
  • Global Game Jam 2016
  • Theme: Rituals
  • Time: 45 hours
Team
  • Benjamin Justice (Code)
  • Sergej Tihonov (Code)
  • Eike Wulff (Code)
  • Stefanie Curth (Art)
